    ALTERATION OF FUND CHOICE FORM

    You can also LOGIN TO AEGON and switch funds online. After log-in, select your policy from the list by clicking on your Aberdeen GPP plan number. Then select ‘Switch Funds’ from the menu on the right
  • LINK
    TOTAL FUND RANGE

    Modal title

    By the clicking the below button you will be directed to Aegon’s Total Fund Range page on The Financial Express website. Please select ‘Pension – Single Price’ in the dropdown selection for Product Type to view the relevant funds.
